channel.title: index on JoannaFlorenceMakes
channel.description: Recent content in index on JoannaFlorenceMakes

item.title: Galápagos penguin
item.description: I think this is my favourite thing I’ve ever embroidered! This Galápagos penguin was designed and stitched by me for the February 2021 Endangered Species Challenge by @rabbithatdesigns.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi there! I'm Joanna Florence, a twenty-something year old from the UK. Welcome to my website. Here you’ll find information about my latest sewing and embroidery makes, patterns and more! Most days you can find me making something with the help of my little assistant, my minature dachshund Charlie.

item.title: The sloth
item.description: I had a 3 day weekend and this is how I felt going back to work today. Pattern by @lemon_made_shop (Celeste Johnston) from her book Freshly Stitched, and printed in this months edition of @loveembroiderymagazine.

item.title: Welcome message
item.description: DESIGN . EMBROIDERY . SEWING . CRAFTS by Joanna Florence

item.title: Spill the tea!
item.description: This months #stitchthisinyourstyle2021 prompt was “drink”. Because I’m British I obviously had to do something involving #tea.

item.title: She's a rebel
item.description: “She’s a symbol of resistance, and she’s holding on my heart like a hand grenade”
